alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Madison River Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 09 at 2:03PM MST until March 11 at 12:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO MIDNIGHT MST FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...South winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...The Madison and Beaverhead River Valleys. * WHEN...From Midnight tonight to Midnight MST Friday Night. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The high winds will result in some areas of blowing snow. In addition, bursts of heavy snow may result in significantly reduced visibility at times Friday afternoon.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.

area.areaDesc: Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Madison River Valley
